languages.text: {n}Следом за арбитром сухой тенью скользит знакомая вам — и, вероятно, целым поколениям клерков дворца Администратума — старуха. Из-за объемной рясы, скрывающей дряхлое тело, кажется, что Мастер печатей не идет — парит над полом.{/n}

{n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Следом за арбитром сухой тенью скользит знакомая вам — и, вероятно, целым поколениям клерков дворца Администратума — старуха. Из-за объемной рясы, скрывающей дряхлое тело, кажется, что Мастер печатей не идет — парит над полом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une ombre décharnée s'avance dans le sillage de l'officier : une vieille femme dont le visage vous est familier, à l'instar sans doute de nombreuses générations successives de clercs employés au palais de l'Administratum. L'ampleur de sa robe donne l'illusion que la maîtresse des sceaux se déplace en glissant à quelques centimètres au-dessus du sol plutôt qu'en marchant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre décharnée s'avance dans le sillage de l'officier : une vieille femme dont le visage vous est familier, à l'instar sans doute de nombreuses générations successives de clercs employés au palais de l'Administratum. L'ampleur de sa robe donne l'illusion que la maîtresse des sceaux se déplace en glissant à quelques centimètres au-dessus du sol plutôt qu'en marchant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una sombra enjuta sigue al Mariscal: una mujer anciana, conocida para ti y, seguramente, para generaciones de funcionarios en el palacio del Administratum. La amplitud de sus vestiduras da la impresión de que la Maestra de Sellos flota en lugar de andar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sombra enjuta sigue al Mariscal: una mujer anciana, conocida para ti y, seguramente, para generaciones de funcionarios en el palacio del Administratum. La amplitud de sus vestiduras da la impresión de que la Maestra de Sellos flota en lugar de andar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}元帅身后跟着的人仿佛干瘪的影子一般。那是个老妇人，你并不陌生，或许好几代内政部官员也很熟悉这个老妇人。她身披一袭宽大的长袍，让人感觉她仿佛并不是走在地上，而是浮在空中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅身后跟着的人仿佛干瘪的影子一般。那是个老妇人，你并不陌生，或许好几代内政部官员也很熟悉这个老妇人。她身披一袭宽大的长袍，让人感觉她仿佛并不是走在地上，而是浮在空中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dem Marschall folgt ein grauer Schatten ... eine alte Frau, die dir und vermutlich Generationen von Beamten im Palast des Administratums bekannt ist. Angesichts der Fülle ihrer Roben scheint die Meisterin der Siegel nicht zu gehen, sondern zu schweben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dem Marschall folgt ein grauer Schatten ... eine alte Frau, die dir und vermutlich Generationen von Beamten im Palast des Administratums bekannt ist. Angesichts der Fülle ihrer Roben scheint die Meisterin der Siegel nicht zu gehen, sondern zu schweben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}将帥の後に一つの渇いた影が続く―それは、あなたにとっても、行政局宮殿で働く多くの事務員たちにとっても見慣れた老女である。彼女のローブの広さによって、印章長が歩いているのではなく、浮いているような錯覚を与える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥の後に一つの渇いた影が続く―それは、あなたにとっても、行政局宮殿で働く多くの事務員たちにとっても見慣れた老女である。彼女のローブの広さによって、印章長が歩いているのではなく、浮いているような錯覚を与える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Miralay'ın ardından ise kuru bir gölge yaklaşıyor. Bu yaşlı kadın, sana ve muhtemelen Administratum Sarayı'nda nesillerdir çalışan memurlara epey bir tanıdık geliyor. Cübbesinin büyüklüğü, Mühür Üstadı'nın zemin üzerinde yürümekten ziyade havada asılı durduğu izlenimini veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dry shadow follows after the Marshal — an old woman, familiar to you and likely to generations of clerks at the Administratum Palace. The ampleness of her robes gives the illusion that the Master of Seals is hovering rather than walking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay'ın ardından ise kuru bir gölge yaklaşıyor. Bu yaşlı kadın, sana ve muhtemelen Administratum Sarayı'nda nesillerdir çalışan memurlara epey bir tanıdık geliyor. Cübbesinin büyüklüğü, Mühür Üstadı'nın zemin üzerinde yürümekten ziyade havada asılı durduğu izlenimini veriyor.{/n}
